purpose: Type-safe async filesystem operations for Deno (Node.js/Bun support in progress): FileSpec, FolderSpec, streaming, and file-type detection
keyExports: FileSpec — file operations: read/write/copy/move/exists, JSON, Base64, Web Streams
FolderSpec — directory operations: list, create, walk
FileSpecWriter — streaming file writer with writeLine() support
Walk namespace — recursive directory traversal utilities

keyPatterns.name: FileSpec for all file I/O
keyPatterns.description: Use FileSpec instead of custom file-handling code; covers readText, writeText, readJson, writeJson, exists, copy, move, Base64, and Web Streams

keyPatterns.name: Web Streams pipe
keyPatterns.description: f.readableStream() / f.writableStream() / f.pipeFrom(stream) / f.pipeTo(dest) for efficient large-file I/O

keyPatterns.name: FileSpecWriter streaming
keyPatterns.description: f.writer() returns a FileSpecWriter; call writeLine()/write() then close() for chunked streaming writes

architecture.keyDesign: Uses deno.json import aliases ($spec, $error, $util, $walk) for internal submodule references; actively being ported to Node.js/Bun
